title: Cream Pitcher And Cover, "Floral Decoration", 1930–40
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Lobed in form, with double curve handle, short spout, lid with bud-shaped finial; painted with a spray of flowers and leaves in polychrome enamel and gilding

tombstone.epitaph:
Cream Pitcher And Cover, "Floral Decoration", 1930–40.
1930–40. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-87-a,b.
